verses.verse: Then the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> to <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
So they <S%H1961>had<s%> as their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> or <S%H9579>Sheba<s%> and <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%>
and Hazar-shual and <S%H1088>Balah<s%> and <S%H6107>Ezem,<s%>
and <S%H513>Eltolad<s%> and <S%H1329>Bethul<s%> and <S%H2767>Hormah,<s%>
and <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%> and Beth-marcaboth and Hazar-susah,
and Beth-lebaoth and <S%H8287>Sharuhen,<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages;<s%>
<S%H5871>Ain,<s%> <S%H9558>Rimmon<s%> and <S%H6281>Ether<s%> and <S%H6228>Ashan,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9161>villages<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Baalath-beer, <S%H9561>Ramah<s%> of the <S%H9561>Negev.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

The <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> [was taken] from the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> for the <S%H2506>share<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H7227>large<s%> for them; so the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> <S%H5157>received<s%> [an] <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of Judah's <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

Now the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%> And the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H8301>Sarid.<s%>

Then their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H3220>west<s%> and to <S%H4831>Maralah,<s%> it then <S%H6293>touched<s%> <S%H1708>Dabbesheth,<s%> and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3362>Jokneam.<s%>

Then it <S%H7725>turned<s%> from <S%H8301>Sarid<s%> to the <S%H9506>east<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> <S%H8121><s%> as <S%H5921>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Chisloth-tabor, and it <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to <S%H1705>Daberath<s%> and up to <S%H3309>Japhia.<s%>

And from <S%H8033>there<s%> it <S%H5674>continued<s%> <S%H9506>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> to Gath-hepher, to Eth-kazin, and it <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to <S%H9558>Rimmon<s%> which <S%H9638>stretches<s%> to <S%H5269>Neah.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>circled<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> it on the <S%H6828>north<s%> to <S%H2615>Hannathon,<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Iphtahel.<s%>

[Included] also [were] <S%H7005>Kattah<s%> and <S%H5096>Nahalal<s%> and <S%H8110>Shimron<s%> and <S%H3030>Idalah<s%> and <S%H1035>Bethlehem;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
The <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> to <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And their <S%H1366>territory<s%> was to <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> and [included] <S%H3694>Chesulloth<s%> and <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%>
and <S%H2663>Hapharaim<s%> and <S%H7866>Shion<s%> and <S%H588>Anaharath,<s%>
and <S%H7245>Rabbith<s%> and <S%H7191>Kishion<s%> and <S%H77>Ebez,<s%>
and <S%H7432>Remeth<s%> and En-gannim and En-haddah and Beth-pazzez.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> and <S%H7831>Shahazumah<s%> and Beth-shemesh, and their <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
Now the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And their <S%H1366>territory<s%> was <S%H2520>Helkath<s%> and <S%H2482>Hali<s%> and <S%H991>Beten<s%> and <S%H407>Achshaph,<s%>
and <S%H487>Allammelech<s%> and <S%H6008>Amad<s%> and <S%H4861>Mishal;<s%> and it <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> and to Shihor-libnath.

And it <S%H7725>turned<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east<s%> <S%H8121><s%> to Beth-dagon, and <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H3317>Iphtahel<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> to Beth-emek and <S%H5272>Neiel;<s%> then it <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> on <S%H8040>north<s%> to <S%H3521>Cabul,<s%>
and <S%H5683>Ebron<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> and <S%H2540>Hammon<s%> and <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H7227>Great<s%> <S%H6721>Sidon.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and to the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre;<s%> then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> to <S%H2621>Hosah,<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by the <S%H9112>region<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib.<s%>
[Included] also [were] <S%H5981>Ummah,<s%> and <S%H663>Aphek<s%> and <S%H7340>Rehob;<s%> twenty-two <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

The <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> was from <S%H2501>Heleph,<s%> from the <S%H436>oak<s%> in <S%H6815>Zaanannim<s%> and Adami-nekeb and <S%H2995>Jabneel,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H3946>Lakkum;<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

Then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to Aznoth-tabor, and <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H2712>Hukkok;<s%> and it <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> and <S%H6293>touched<s%> <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east.<s%> <S%H8121><s%>
And the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> [were] <S%H6661>Ziddim,<s%> <S%H6863>Zer<s%> and <S%H2575>Hammath,<s%> <S%H7557>Rakkath<s%> and <S%H3672>Chinnereth,<s%>
and <S%H128>Adamah<s%> and <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H2674>Hazor,<s%>
and <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei<s%> and En-hazor,
and <S%H3375>Yiron<s%> and Migdal-el, <S%H2765>Horem<s%> and Beth-anath and Beth-shemesh; <S%H8672>nineteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
The <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>fell<s%> to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
And the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> was <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%> and Ir-shemesh,
and <S%H8169>Shaalabbin<s%> and <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> and <S%H3494>Ithlah,<s%>
and <S%H356>Elon<s%> and <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%>
and <S%H514>Eltekeh<s%> and <S%H1405>Gibbethon<s%> and <S%H1191>Baalath,<s%>
and <S%H3055>Jehud<s%> and Bene-berak and Gath-rimmon,
and Me-jarkon and <S%H7542>Rakkon,<s%> with the <S%H1366>territory<s%> <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H3305>Joppa.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> <S%H3318>beyond<s%> <S%H4480><s%> them; for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with <S%H3959>Leshem<s%> and <S%H3920>captured<s%> it. Then they <S%H5221>struck<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> it and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in it; and they <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3959>Leshem<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> their father.

<S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

When they <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H5157>apportioning<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> by its <S%H1367>borders,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>

In <S%H5921>accordance<s%> with the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7592>asked,<s%> Timnath-serah in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%> So he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H3427>settled<s%> in it.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H5159>inheritances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the households of the <S%H1>tribes<s%> of the <S%H4294>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>Israel<s%> <S%H3478>distributed<s%> by <S%H5157>lot<s%> in <S%H1486>Shiloh<s%> <S%H7887>before<s%> the <S%H6440>Lord,<s%> at the <S%H3068>doorway<s%> of the <S%H6607>tent<s%> of <S%H168>meeting.<s%> So they <S%H4150>finished<s%> <S%H3615>dividing<s%> the <S%H2505>land.<s%>
